entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
